title: Signature Sleep Memoir 12 Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress, King Size
features: 12” multi-layer memory foam mattress with medium firm comfort level and soft polyester knit cover.

Gel memory foam top layer molds to the body’s natural shape, helps provide a cool night’s sleep, helps evenly distribute body weight to reduce motion transfer and provides balanced support to alleviate pressure points.
High-density foam base provides additional support and long-lasting durability.
Made in Italy. Ships in one box. Shipped rolled and compressed. Available in Twin, Full, Queen and King size. Offered in various thickness options: 6”, 8”, 10” and 12”. 10-year limited warranty.
Product dimensions: 80”L x 76”W x 12”H Net weight: 80.5lbs Shipping dimensions: Gross weight: 95lbs Shipping dimensions: 78”L x 14”W x 14”H.
description: Get lost in your dreams with the Signature Sleep Memoir 12" Gel Memory Foam Mattress. You sleep 8 hours a day, so why not make those restful hours as comfortable as possible? Constructed with a multi-layer memory foam core, the Memoir Gel Memory Foam Mattress is wrapped in a soft polyester knit cover and boasts a medium-firm comfort level to help provide support that lasts. The top layer of gel memory foam will mold to the natural shape of your body, help provide a cool night’s sleep and provide balanced support to alleviate pressure points. What’s more, the memory foam will help evenly distribute your body weight so that you can toss and turn all night long without your partner waking up from all the motion transfer. The base of high-density foam serves as an extra layer to provide additional support and long-lasting durability. Made in Italy, the Signature Sleep Memoir Gel Memory Foam Mattress collection is available in multiple sizes (twin, full, queen and king), and is offered in a variety of thickness options (6”, 8”, 10” and 12”).
